subject: Soccer
Bribery and Kickbacks
organizations: Confederation of North, Central American and Caribbean Association Football (CONCACAF)
lead_paragraph: Testimony by Mr. Blazer, who pleaded guilty to widespread corruption charges in the United States, helped lead to the indictment of more than a dozen other officials in the sport.
snippet: Testimony by Mr. Blazer, who pleaded guilty to widespread corruption charges in the United States, helped lead to the indictment of more than a dozen other officials in the sport.
